name: Evermore Investments
overview: Evermore Investments, LLC is a leading private equity firm based in Louisville, KY. Evermore looks to invest in post revenue developing companies with focused and committed management teams open to working with a capital partner whose interest is to apply the vast array of skills and resources Evermore has to offer. In addition to serving as an equity partner to fuel growth and development, Evermore seeks to identify mature companies well positioned for recapitalization through a combination of equity and debt with a skilled management team looking for financial and entrepreneurial leadership to get to that next level. Founded in 2001, Evermore has amassed an impressive collection of seasoned business professionals, entrepreneurs, analysts, and legal experts. As investment partners who provide significantly more than mere capital resources - they provide tutelage, guidance, and support for portfolio company leadership teams.
